text.name: Golden Goose
text.description:
{Golden Goose}

When equipped, the Golden Goose increases your income by a total of 7000 gold per day.
text.event: You wander on an abandoned house of a collector in search for a camp place. Most of the goods were long stolen by the marauders, but you were able to find a couple of dusty pet statues. You vaguely recognize one of them. You rub the dust off one of them, and discover a golden goose.
